@Ohdangitsrio Well you have to make sure to be at Gas Works Park for sunset, it's the best spot. I have to go through my bank account to see all the ice cream places I went to haha. Capitol Hill is really cool to walk around for food/drinks. It's kinda like Echo Park.
All you need to know to start building for Echo Show and Echo Spot is here: https://t.co/tNAiEHfpHB via @alexadevs
Youâ€™re not the only one. My Echo Spot started immediately. https://t.co/CrARAYoZUR

Echo Spot is now my favorite toy.  I ask it to play any song I want and it just plays.   I don't even care about any other functions. Had it 5 minutes and I am in love.  Sound is as good as my Walkman from  childhood!
